author: mbk
msg: Merge the changes in branches/issue-951-dev into the (much) more recent
The following files had trivial conflicts from the merge:

author: rooneg
msg: For argument parsing errors, do not show the help message, because useful
information is thrown away.  Instead, show an explicit error message if one
is available, otherwise show the help.
(main): If an argument parsing error has a useful (non-NULL or not empty)
error message, display that instead of just showing the help.
